KCSResourceService Class Reference

Inherits from NSObject
Declared in KCSBlobService.h

Overview

Kinvey File Service wrapper

This class is used to provide access to all Kinvey file services.

Tasks

Downloading Resources

  • + downloadResource:completionBlock:progressBlock:KCS_DEPRECATED:

    Downloads the given Resource ID into a local NSData object
  • + downloadResource:toFile:completionBlock:progressBlock:KCS_DEPRECATED:

    Downloads the given Resource ID into a local file.
  • + getStreamingURLForResource:completionBlock:progressBlock:KCS_DEPRECATED:

    Obtain a 30-second time-limited URL for streaming a resource stored on Kinvey.

  • + saveData:toResource:completionBlock:progressBlock:KCS_DEPRECATED:

    Saves the given Data into the specified resource.

Deleting Resources

  • + deleteResource:completionBlock:progressBlock:KCS_DEPRECATED:

Class Methods

deleteResource:completionBlock:progressBlock:KCS_DEPRECATED:

Delete the given resource from Kinvey.

+ (void)deleteResource:(NSString *)resourceId completionBlock:(KCSCompletionBlock)completionBlock progressBlock:(KCSProgressBlock)progressBlock KCS_DEPRECATED

Parameters

resourceId

The resource ID that should be removed.

completionBlock

the block called when the operation completes or fails

progressBlock

the block called 0+ times while the operation is in progress

Discussion

Delete the given resource from Kinvey.

Use this method to delete a given resource from Kinvey. Additional attempts to access this resource will fail with error code 404.

Declared In

KCSBlobService.h

downloadResource:completionBlock:progressBlock:KCS_DEPRECATED:

Downloads the given Resource ID into a local NSData object

+ (void)downloadResource:(NSString *)resourceId completionBlock:(KCSCompletionBlock)completionBlock progressBlock:(KCSProgressBlock)progressBlock KCS_DEPRECATED

Parameters

resourceId

The Resource ID to download.

completionBlock

the block called when the operation completes or fails

progressBlock

the block called 0+ times while the operation is in progress

Discussion

Downloads the given Resource ID into a local NSData object

This method should be used to download a resource from Kinvey into a local NSData object.

Declared In

KCSBlobService.h

downloadResource:toFile:completionBlock:progressBlock:KCS_DEPRECATED:

Downloads the given Resource ID into a local file.

+ (void)downloadResource:(NSString *)resourceId toFile:(NSString *)filename completionBlock:(KCSCompletionBlock)completionBlock progressBlock:(KCSProgressBlock)progressBlock KCS_DEPRECATED

Parameters

resourceId

The Resource ID to download.

filename

The filename that the resource will use as the download location. This will be set in the KCSResourceResponse that the delegate receives.

completionBlock

the block called when the operation completes or fails

progressBlock

the block called 0+ times while the operation is in progress

Discussion

Downloads the given Resource ID into a local file.

This method should be used to download a resource from Kinvey into a local File. The file can then be used to access the resource.

Declared In

KCSBlobService.h

getStreamingURLForResource:completionBlock:progressBlock:KCS_DEPRECATED:

Obtain a 30-second time-limited URL for streaming a resource stored on Kinvey.

+ (void)getStreamingURLForResource:(NSString *)resourceId completionBlock:(KCSCompletionBlock)completionBlock progressBlock:(KCSProgressBlock)progressBlock KCS_DEPRECATED

Parameters

resourceId

The Resource ID to stream

completionBlock

the block called when the operation completes or fails

progressBlock

the block is NEVER called, so just supply nil.

Discussion

Obtain a 30-second time-limited URL for streaming a resource stored on Kinvey.

This method is used for large objects stored on the Resource Service. It’s used to get a URL that allows the resource to be streamed to the device.

Declared In

KCSBlobService.h

saveData:toResource:completionBlock:progressBlock:KCS_DEPRECATED:

Saves the given Data into the specified resource.

+ (void)saveData:(NSData *)data toResource:(NSString *)resourceId completionBlock:(KCSCompletionBlock)completionBlock progressBlock:(KCSProgressBlock)progressBlock KCS_DEPRECATED

Parameters

data

The Data to upload to Kinvey.

resourceId

The resource ID to use for remote storage

completionBlock

the block called when the operation completes or fails

progressBlock

the block called 0+ times while the operation is in progress

Discussion

Saves the given Data into the specified resource.

This method is used to upload NSData into the Kinvey service.

Declared In

KCSBlobService.h

saveLocalResource:completionBlock:progressBlock:KCS_DEPRECATED:

Saves the given File to Kinvey.

+ (void)saveLocalResource:(NSString *)filename completionBlock:(KCSCompletionBlock)completionBlock progressBlock:(KCSProgressBlock)progressBlock KCS_DEPRECATED

Parameters

filename

The filename of the local file to upload.

completionBlock

the block called when the operation completes or fails

progressBlock

the block called 0+ times while the operation is in progress

Discussion

Saves the given File to Kinvey.

This method is used to upload a local file to Kinvey, the resource ID will be the last path component of the filename with extension.

Declared In

KCSBlobService.h

saveLocalResource:toResource:completionBlock:progressBlock:KCS_DEPRECATED:

Saves the given File into the specified resource.

+ (void)saveLocalResource:(NSString *)filename toResource:(NSString *)resourceId completionBlock:(KCSCompletionBlock)completionBlock progressBlock:(KCSProgressBlock)progressBlock KCS_DEPRECATED

Parameters

filename

The filename of the local file to upload.

resourceId

The resource ID to use for remote storage

completionBlock

the block called when the operation completes or fails

progressBlock

the block called 0+ times while the operation is in progress

Discussion

Saves the given File into the specified resource.

This method is used to upload a local file to Kinvey, use this varient to specify an exact remote resource ID.

Declared In

KCSBlobService.h

saveLocalResourceWithURL:completionBlock:progressBlock:KCS_DEPRECATED:

Saves the given URL to Kinvey.

+ (void)saveLocalResourceWithURL:(NSURL *)URL completionBlock:(KCSCompletionBlock)completionBlock progressBlock:(KCSProgressBlock)progressBlock KCS_DEPRECATED

Parameters

URL

The file URL of the local file to upload.

completionBlock

the block called when the operation completes or fails

progressBlock

the block called 0+ times while the operation is in progress

Discussion

Saves the given URL to Kinvey.

This method is used to upload a local file to Kinvey, the resource ID will be the last path component of the filename with extension.
